Package model

Class Collider

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.Rect
model.Collider
public class Collider extends Rect
The Collider allows for performing collision detection. A seperate entity, Collider, can be made with the dimensions needed for collision. This means that other classes such as Sprite can operate independently without being tied to how collisions work.

  • Constructor Details

    • Collider

      public Collider(Game game, float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Collider constructor creates a collider with the given dimensions.
      Parameters:
      game - to instantiate children nodes to.
      x - absolute x position to place the collider object.
      y - absolute y position to place the collider object.
      width - for the collider size.
      height - for the collider size.

    • Collider

      public Collider(Game game, float width, float height)
      Collider constructor creates a collider with the given dimensions. It is set to coordinates 0,0 when created.
      Parameters:
      game - to instantiate children nodes to.
      width - for the collider size.
      height - for the collider size.

  • Method Details

    • hasCollidedWith

      public boolean hasCollidedWith(Collider other)
      Return true/false whether the current collider is currently touching another collider.
      Parameters:
      other - collider to check for.
      Returns:
      true if touching, false if not touching

    • isOutOfBounds

      public boolean isOutOfBounds(float boundsX, float boundsY, float boundsWidth, float boundsHeight)
      Check if the collider is bounded within a given area.
      Parameters:
      boundsX - absolute x position (top left)
      boundsY - absolute y position (top left)
      boundsWidth - bounds width (growing to bottom right)
      boundsHeight - bounds height (growing to bottom right)
      Returns:
      true if bounded, false if not bounded.
